mapper.select: select id, project_id, create_time, update_time, is_deleted, method_hash, seq, show_uri, class_path, method_path, annotation_name, simple_class_name, full_method from lv_invoke_spring_controller where id = #{id}

(#{entity.projectId}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.isDeleted}, #{entity.methodHash}, #{entity.seq}, #{entity.showUri}, #{entity.classPath}, #{entity.methodPath}, #{entity.annotationName}, #{entity.simpleClassName}, #{entity.fullMethod})
